intro: Strephonema mannii, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its striking, showy flowers that come in a variety of colors. The plant has fleshy, thick leaves that help it retain moisture in its native environment. It is often cultivated as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and ease of care. Strephonema mannii prefers bright, indirect light and well-draining soil to thrive.
